ComicInfo.Summary:
The previous issue ended with Ace and company surrounded and attacked by a horde of lesbian zombies. Despite Gwen's protests, Ace convinces her to slip away on her own and bring back help, while he and the boys hold off the monsters.
A desperate plan, Ace knows he won't survive the battle. And maybe that's for the best, because if he lives he'll have to make an admission that he'll never be able to live down...
Read part 6 of the zom-com limited-series comic where fantasy turns to nightmare. An homage to cheesy 80s horror movies and a send-up of porn in every age, this NSFW comic book series will have you rolling on the floor laughing. That is, until you realize you'll never trust a girl to give you a blow job again.
